projects.name: Luster Products
projects.description: Single story tilt-up warehoouse with attached 2 story office.  The office portion featuues are angled tilt-up central strair core that also leans away from the building.

projects.name: Campbell Heights Office
projects.description: A 4 story til-up office with central cast in place concret core.  This project also included an attached 2 story warehouse space.  The centrel core features an full heith open atrium with bridges linking the floors on either side.

projects.name: Sardis Sports Complex
projects.description: A sinlge pad ice arena built to supliminent an existing facility. This project uniquley combines tilt-up construction for the primary walls supporting a frame-less pre-engineered steel builting for the roof.

projects.name: Fair Haven Vancouver
projects.description: A seniors home built for Fair Haven Home Society. The project is comprised of a 4 story wood framed building over a single level of underground parking.

projects.name: Fair Haven McKay
projects.description: A seniors home built for Fair Haven Home Society. The project is comprised of a 4 story wood framed building over a single level of underground parking.

projects.name: The Eleanor
projects.description: A 6 story wood framed builting for affordable rental units, over a single leel of parking.

projects.name: Cold Storage Facility
projects.description: A cold storage faclity targeting the food industry.  The main building is constructed from structural steel clad with insulated metal panels.  This porject also feature several accessory building housing offices, and mechanical spaces.
